text: kavurun tama deviyange (suddha vu kuranaya namæti) pæhædili dænuma laba ættehuda ovunda, ovunta deviyan visin (isata) pahala karanu læbu dæya (injil) saksiyak vasayen ætteda ovunda, tavada ovunta meyata pera pahala karanu læbu musage dharmaya ek margopadesayak vasayenda, varaprasadayak vasayenda ætteda ovunda, anivayadæyenma mema dharmayada visvasa karanu æta. (ovun venuven vu phalavipakaya nam svargayayi). mema parsavayan (tunen) kavurun meya pratiksepa kala vuvada, ovunta porondu dena lada sthanaya nirayayi. ebævin (nabiye!) oba mehi podiyak ho sækayak æti kara noganu. niyata vasayenma meya obage deviyan visin pahala karana lada satya (dharmaya)yi! ehet minisungen bohomayak dena (meya) visvasa karanne næta
